hymn.title: Light after darkness
hymn.category: Comfort in Trials—By Gain from Suffering

layout.singingstanza: Light af -- ter dark -- ness, Gain af -- ter loss, Strength af -- ter weak -- ness Crown af -- ter cross; Sweet af -- ter bit -- ter, Hope af -- ter fears, Home af -- ter wan -- d'ring, Praise af -- ter tears.

lyrics.stanza: Light after darkness, Gain after loss, Strength after weakness Crown after cross; Sweet after bitter, Hope after fears, Home after wand'ring, Praise after tears.
Sheaves after sowing, Sun after rain, Sight after mystery, Peace after pain; Joy after sorrow, Calm after blast, Rest after weariness, Sweet rest at last.
Near after distant, Gleam after gloom, Love after loneliness, Life after tomb; After long agony, Rapture of bliss, Right was the pathway, Leading to this.
